description: Treat the family to a flavour-packed roast pork loin dinner that's ready in just 3 steps, complete with golden roast potatoes and a pickled onion salad.
keywords: Roast Pork With Roast Potato & Pickled Onion Salad
name: Roast Pork With Roast Potato & Pickled Onion Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 660 g Woolworths COOK pork loin roast with herbs & spices

recipeInstructions.text: Place potato in a large bowl with pickled onion and parsley. Toss to combine. Slice pork and serve with potato salad.
